channel.title: blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels and self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Privacy and Social Media
item.description: Somewhat apropos of what I posted recently about freedoms, there’s been a kerfuffle about Facebook and privacy (again). A particular post I just read kind of set me off, so I decided to expand on a comment I left there.
